promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic basic goat grass-type pokemon wearing white armor. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armorweed, a a dynamic basic goat grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Petal Whirlwind. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "grass" or "Armorweed". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, goat-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: With its Plant-horned visage, Armorweed struts across woodland expanse, stirring up Petal Whirlwinds to defend its territory from threats.
